attributes.action: Allow Ukrainians fleeing war visa-free entry to the UK
attributes.additional_details: The United Kingdom has a centuries-old, time-honoured tradition of helping people in need. Our history is full of examples of the government and the people choosing the difficult path in order to combat warmongers, slavers and despots. We should seek, we believe, to live up to the example our predecessors set. Let us help those in need.
attributes.background: Russia has invaded Ukraine and heavy fighting is taking place in Ukrainian cities. Let Ukrainians come to the UK without any Visa requirements so they can flee the conflict and allow them to stay and work for the duration of the conflict.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
